title: Table 2.D.4.1 — Data Required for Determination of the DF — External ClSCC

rows.comment: The drivers for ExtClSCC. See 2.D.2.6.2 for driver descriptions and selection.
Crack severity based on susceptibility (temperature and weather; see below).
The date the component was installed or the date the last inspection where no damage was found.
Relates to the type of coating applied, for example: None—no coating or primer only; Medium—single coat epoxy; High—multi-coat epoxy or filled epoxy.
Determine the age of the coating.
The effectiveness category that has been performed on the component.
The number of inspections in each effectiveness category that have been performed.
Determine the expected operating temperature (consider normal and non-normal operating conditions).
